I have news about your conferencing service
YOUR ONE SOURCE
FOR ALL THE WAYS YOU NEED TO MEET
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
As your PGi account manager, I want to introduce you to all the services that we currently provide your company, and share useful information that Sales professionals value, like:
- Which web conferencing options work best for client presentations, sales training and engagement - How you can use video conferencing to have more personal connections with your customers and your remote sales teams - Who to contact if you need a PGi Event Specialist to help you set-up and host a larger event, like an all-hands call - How to get the most out of your day-to-day meetings by taking advantage of all the features available to you - Where you can find online resources for training & support Do you have 15 minutes?
I'd like to learn more about your needs so I can recommend some specific solutions. I will call to get some time on your calendar and you are welcome to contact me at your convenience.
Regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
